enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The workshop on innovative options for financing the development and transfer of technologies was held from 27-29 September 2004, in Montreal, Canada.
The workshop sought to create a better understanding of innovative financing for technology transfer under the UNFCCC.

It provided an opportunity for participants to share experiences and information on good practice for financing technology transfer, and to catalyze innovative thinking on the issue, as well as to help narrow any differences that might exist.
The discussions and outcomes of the workshop will be taken up by SBSTA-21.
